author: dcposch
content:
<@543900561460822016> , Danny and I are organizing a conference focused on attack-resistant peer to peer protocols. Join us for the first ever KademliaCon on Friday, Sep 2, at Stanford.

We have some amazing talks and workshops planned. Details: https://kademlia.notion.site/KademliaCon-Agenda-17ee1f62907742ccb064267c1ad032e3

author: dcposch
content: If you have any ideas that'd make a good last-minute addition, please DM. Otherwise, if you're interested in coming, apply here: https://forms.gle/Y995BiguAf96BcyBA
